About

Engineering predictive models and analytic solutions using data driven methodologies and practices across interdisciplinary and applied fields in academia and industry. Attention given to data acquisition through data mining and sensor development and image collection and signal processing. Data Set machine learning and analysis to yield crucial evidence and information for policy and decision makers through

- Natural Language processing (NLP) - logistic regression - Generalized Linear Models (GLM) - Ordinary Least Squares - Neural Networks - Random Forests - K-nearest neighbor algorithm (KNN) - Code runtime optimization

Project 1

Energy focus autocorrelation regression time series predictive analysis for electrical energy consumption at Boston Public Library.

  • Client: Boston Energy Commission
  • Info: April 2014
  • Service: Energy

Project 7

Molecular Medicine - Botulinum Neurotoxin (BoNT) is a three subunite compound that delivers its toxin "cargo" subunite across the blood brain barrier. The BoNT the L chain (light) is for general complex absorption and dissociates in the intracellular reducing environment. The H chain (heavy) is responsible for uptake into nerve endings and is linked by disulfide bonds to the cargo. The cargo toxin has been replaced with GFP and shown to translocate to the targeted neurons.

  • Client: Experimed Bioscience
  • Info: October 2017
  • Service: Molecular Biology

Project 6

DATA SCIENCE - Using natural language processing on job postings for "Data Scientist" to record the number of times various data science skill word appear in postings as an indication of skill importance in the Data Science field.

  • Client: DATBOS
  • Info: October 2017
  • Service: NLP Skill Data Mining

Project 2

Natural Language Processing of "Data Scientist" Skills - Data mining of Data Scientist job postings for machine learning skill terms instance counting. Skill terms ar mined, sorted and plotted according total number of instances skill terms appears in all postings and adjusted for multiple instances in a single post.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Info: Data Science Skills
  • Service: NLP Machine Learning

Project 3

Process optical pattern recognition algorithm development and machine vision inspection automation, imaging and data processing in the final stages of product development and product introduction in a very competitive automation market.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Info: April 2014
  • Service: LIFESCIENCE

Project 4

Stem Cell Research - Parthenode stem cells type AIDS therapeutic library creation CRISPR genome editing to disable CCR5 proteins and insert a fluorescent protein at mutation site to compare the mechanisms and signal transduction pathways of virus in murine and human models.

  • Client: Start BSCRF
  • Info: CRISPR CCR5
  • Service: Stem Cell Research

Project 5

Technical strategic vision for the development of novel Augmented Reality (AR) digital health system platform technologies designed to transform realtime surgical protocols. Build and support a development team of cross discipline specialists for effective collaboration research agreements. Created system platform introducing new technologies including 3D capability, remote laser control, and surgical suite compliment system prototyping using 3D printing.

  • Client: Start Proximie
  • Info: Augmented Reality Surgery
  • Service: TELE-HEALTH
